name: OR operator - single keyword 'urgent' (1/4 = 0.625)
query: I need urgent help with my account

name: OR operator - keyword 'emergency' (1/4 = 0.625)
query: This is an emergency situation please help

name: OR operator - keyword 'immediate' (1/4 = 0.625)
query: I need immediate assistance with this problem

name: OR operator - keyword 'asap' (1/4 = 0.625)
query: Please respond asap this is important

name: OR operator - TWO keywords (2/4 = 0.75)
query: This urgent emergency needs your help now

name: OR operator - THREE keywords (3/4 = 0.875)
query: This is urgent and needs immediate response asap

name: OR operator - ALL FOUR keywords (4/4 = 1.0)
description: urgent_request OR with all 4 keywords matched
query: This urgent emergency requires immediate attention asap please

name: AND operator - both keywords present (2/2 = 1.0)
description: sensitive_data AND matches - all keywords present
query: My SSN and credit card info were stolen

name: REGEX operator - email pattern (1/2 = 0.75)
query: Please send the report to user.name@domain.com today

name: REGEX operator - Windows path (1/2 = 0.75)
query: The file is located at C:\Program Files\MyApp\config.txt
